---
title: "Welcome"
---

Taib Biygautane is a second-year doctoral student in political science at the University of Maryland (UMD). Prior to joining UMD, he pursued graduate-level coursework in International Conflict Management at Kennesaw State University and non-degree graduate courses in International Affairs at Georgia Tech. Biygautane's research interests include the politics of foreign direct investment (FDI) and investor perceptions, the role of heads of states and their attributes in international politics, and public opinion.
